meanings.definition: Making a loud, harsh sound like metal being struck.
meanings.sent1: The clankiest door in the house always wakes me up in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The old car in the garage had the clankiest engine I had ever heard.
meanings.sent3: The clankiest pot in the kitchen sounded like a drum solo.
meanings.sent4: The clankiest pipes in the building echoed through the halls like a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The clankiest machinery in the factory drowned out all other noises.
